name: Command & Conquer 3 Replay File
summary: Recording of a campaign from Command and Conquer 3: Kane's Wrath, a real-time strategy game; saves the entire gameplay from a campaign so that it can be played back at a later time; typically saved as "filename.KWReplay."

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Electronic Arts Command & Conquer 3: Kane's Wrath
